page.title: 09Ashford Manor,Ashford C.
page.content: The Manor was built in the 16oo's but we think there was another house on the same site before the present Manor was built.Mr Hall is the owner of the Manor. He has lived there all his life and he owns the buildings of Ashford School and High Meadow Farm in Ashford too.It came to belong to his family in 1860 because his great, great Aunt married somebody named John Downs.There are about 12 rooms in the Manor.In the summer Mr Hall likes his parlour best and in the winter he likes his sitting room best.The Manor is built of stone and in the 1930's Mr Hall made it smaller and lower so it would be cheaper and easier to run.Mr Hall's favourite piece of furniture is a very old bookcase.The Manor has a big garden which Mr Hall uses to grow a few vegetables with lawns and flower beds also.
